description.en:
1-7.) Boku no Kaasan wa AV Joyuu. (My Mom is a Porn Actress)
* A single mother who, unable to depend on anyone, goes to work in the AV industry to support her son, who discovers the truth and begins to fantasize about it until she discovers it and they start a forbidden relationship

8-11.) Gibo to Futari de Kurashitara... (When I Live Alone with My Stepmother...)
